title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: NEAR Gains 11.7%, Leading Index Higher Over Weekend
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Aptos (APT) joined NEAR Protocol (NEAR) as a top performer, gaining 8.7% from Friday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2538.74, up 3.0% (+74.8) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

Nineteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: NEAR (+11.7%) and APT (+8.7%).

Laggards: BCH (-0.5%) and XRP (+1.9%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 index gained 3.0% with 19 of 20 assets trading higher, led by NEAR (+11.7%) and APT (+8.7%), indicating broad market strength and positive momentum.
